Dear Ho Chi Minh City health sector,
Warning that the number of children with respiratory infections
continues to increase, especially at the
end of the year when the seasonal weather
creates favorable conditions for the virus.  easy to
develop attacks recorded at
children's hospitals in Ho Chi Minh City, the number of
cases increased from 30 to 40 minutes compared to the beginning of the year,
many cases were hospitalized due to severe illness
at the respiratory department of Children's Hospital 2 in
Ho City  In Ho Chi Minh City, the number of patients is
1.5 times higher than the number of patients,
according to doctors. Most of the children are sick
between 6 months and 1 year old because the immune system
is not yet fully developed, causing the disease to
increase in severity.  What happened recently

15 billion VND a year.  However, he
announced that he would not participate in investing in
Thuy Ta restaurant because the business plan required
changing the name of Thuy Ta Thanh restaurant.
HV restaurant in Da Lat city said that
Mr. Ha's proposal had no basis.

1998, the graphic design of

two motorbikes collided, killing two people
on the spot and two others were injured. The
accident occurred on Lien Xa road, passing
through Hung Quan district, Binh Phuoc province, on the evening of
November 25.
According to initial information, about 18 people were identified by C
M Ngo.  Mr. 33i was driving a motorbike
on Lien Xa road from
Tay Ninh province to Quang district. When arriving at
Phuoc An commune, this motorbike suddenly collided head-
on with a motorbike driven by a 20-year-old driver.
Two other young men carrying
each other were traveling in the opposite direction when
the strong accident caused you and the police to report on the spot. The
remaining two people were seriously injured and were
taken to the emergency room. Both vehicles were
seriously damaged. The cause of the accident is being
investigated.  Authorities are investigating and clarifying that
on the hydroelectric lake bed in the
border area between Gia Lai and

allowed to operate within the protected area of ​​the

and causing

This created conditions for businesses to
take advantage of it for profit to end

Spanish artist The
annual pusca Camel festival is
taking place in full swing in  Ban razan in
northwestern India, according to the organizers, this year there are
about 30,000 camels and many
other animals present at this interesting festival. The
main character of the event is the
camels dressed in
wing powder.  Their colorful wreaths and
impressive performances attract a large number of
locals and tourists who come
here every November.
Every year, the event is more spectacular than Quy
Mon. This year, it has broken the previous record.
In addition to being commercial, the event also respects
local culture by including
folk games, performing arts,
camel beauty contests and many
other sports. This is my third time coming to India. So this is

November 28 Climate change has caused many
snow resorts in the Austrian province of
Tyron to face many difficulties in
planning for the upcoming winter.
However, this year the snow resorts
are using this method.  reserve
Snow to create ski trails
for visitors If the snow falls late
or when
necessary We will collect the Snow poles from the
previous winter and cover them with half a
meter of rosewood. This wood will keep the Snow
from falling.  much during the summer until November
next year. The stored snow will be removed to
create ski trails at the
resorts. According to Mr. Vaner, with this method, it
only takes 10 to 15 minutes. The snow will melt. The
remaining snow will be used for  create a ski
path Snow due to climate change
natural snow cover is no longer as
much as before that's why every
few years we decided to
create our own snow for our
own ski paths  Because Snow arrived later than
usual this year, the

days to build a
km long snow road. According to Mr. Vaner, the Snow reserve method
helps the resorts ensure  In addition to
